actions.committee: Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to correct the enrollment of the bill H.R. 2215.
short_title: Family Farmers and Family Fishermen Protection Act of 2002

summary.text: Requires the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make specified corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 2215 (21st Century Department of Justice Appropriations Authorization Act) to add the Family Farmers and Family Fishermen Protection Act of 2002.

titles.title: Family Farmers and Family Fishermen Protection Act of 2002
Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to correct the enrollment of the bill H.R. 2215.
